main event: A possible UFO sighting was reported in the Pacific region, with an object observed in the sky for about 4 minutes.
interesting points: The object was the size and brightness of a first magnitude star.
The object was observed at a position of 47-09N 169-55W, bearing 020 and at an altitude of 60 degrees.
The object was observed moving from south to north at a very high speed.
The report was filed as a CIRVIS (Communications Instructions for Reporting Vital Intelligence Sightings) report.
The sighting was reported to various military commands, including CINCPACAF, CINCNORAD, and CINCPAC.
sighted object: a bright object in the sky
